defs: the act or an instance of singing.

ಆಳು ನೋಡಿದರೆ ಆಕಾರ, ಬಾಳು ನೋಡಿದರೆ ಬಾಯಿಬಡಿದುಕೋ ಬೇಕು āḷu nōḍidre ākāra, bāḷu nōḍidare bāyi baḍidukō bēku (said of a person) outwardly impressive, while inwardly useless; the appearance veils the essence; fat hens lay few eggs; ಆಳಾಗಬಲ್ಲವ ಅರಸಾಗಬಲ್ಲ āḷāga ballava arasāgaballa he who can work hard himself, may manage to get the work done too; he who cannot be a servant of many, will never be a master; ಆಳುಮಾಡಿದ್ದು ಹಾಳು, ತಾನು ಮಾಡಿದ್ದು ಉತ್ತಮ āḷu māḍiddu hāḷu, tānu māḍiddu uttama self-done is well done; depending on others for one's work to be done, is dangerous; ಆಳುದ್ದ ಭಾವಿಗೆ ಗೇಣುದ್ದ ಹಗ್ಗ āḷudda bhāvige gēṇudda hagga to work with insufficient means; to put a shark in a swimming pool.

the pungent-smelling gum resin obtained from this plant, used in treating illness, and in cooking; asafoetida.
another plant of the same family, Ferula jaeschkeana.

ಇಂಗುತಿನ್ನಿಸು iŋgutinnisu to cheat; to defraud; ಇಂಗುಹಚ್ಚು iŋguhaccu = ಇಂಗುತಿನ್ನಿಸು; ಇಂಗು ತಿಂದು ಮಂಗನಾಗು iŋgu tindu maŋganāgu (prov.) to be or get cheated; ಇಂಗು ತೆಂಗು ಇದ್ದರೆ ಮಂಗನಾದರೂ ಅಡಿಗೆ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ iŋgu teŋgu iddare maŋganādarū adige māḍuttade (prov.) when all the essential things are available, it hardly requires any skill to bring about the result.
(water) to get percolated or evaporated.
(one's sight) to be lost.
the plant Terminalia catapa of Combretaceae family; country almond.
= ಇಂಗುಲಿಕ.
bright-red mercuric sulphide used as a pigment; vermilion.
the bright red colour (as of vermilion).
= ಇಂಗುಲಿಕ.
the plant Tragia involucrata of Euphorbiaceae family; climbing nettle.
= ಇಂಗುಲಿಕ.
= ಇಂಗುಲಿಕ.
a pleasant sexual union.
a melodious tune; an agreeable sound.
= ಇಂಗೊರಲ್.
a lake or pond of sweet (pleasant) water.
the tall cane of the tropical grass, Saccharum officinarum; sugar-cane (so called, as it yields sweet sugar).
a bow made of a sugar cane.
the arrow of Kāma, the Love-God.
Kāma, whose bow is made of sugar-cane.
the Kama's bow made of sugar-cane.
= ಇಂಗೋಲವಿಲ್.
Kāma, whose bow is made of sugar-cane.
a man originally belonging to England or whose mother-tongue is English; an English-man.
an old unit of measure of land area under rule of English people.
of or relating to England, her people, their culture or their language; English.
the language of the people of England; English.
a sweet dish made of rice flour, jaggery, and fried in oil or clarified butter.
a melodious sound or tone.
the bird cuckoo, remarkable for its sweet crying.
that which is pleasing or delighting the mind; sweetness; pleasantness.
the Cupid's arrow, causing pleasant pain; the desire for coition.
Kāma, the Love God.
to make sweet sounds; to talk pleasantly.
to produce melodious sounds.
a flow of sweet liquid as of honey (chiefly used fig.- to soothe with sweet words).
any of a large number of small, slender, long-tailed decapods, mostly marine, many of which are highly valued as food; shrimp.
a contrivance, gen. portable, with rungs between two supports, for going up and down; a ladder.
the plant Phoenix sylvestris of Arecaceae family; toddy-palm; wild palm.

an inch - a) a unit of linear measure equal to a twelfth of a foot (2.54 centimetres); b) a fall (of rain, snow, etc.) equal to the amount that would cover a surface to the depth of 2.54 centimetres; an inch.

a thin strip of wood, metal, etc. with a straight edge and markings in whole and fractional units of length, as inches or centimetres or both, used in drawing straight lines, measuring length, etc.; a ruler; a scale.
mental or bodily pain; harm; .
to lose the juice, essential juice.
to lose one's enthusiasm, vigour, etc.
= ಇಂಜಾನುಮಳೆ.

an engineer - a) a person who operates or supervises the operation of engines or technical equipment; b) a specialist in planning and directing operations in some technical field; c) a member of a military engineering unit trained in the construction and demolition of bridges, roads, airfields, etc.; d) a specialist in software.
(dial.) the quality, fact or an instance of falling or striking with great force, more intense than usual or normal (said of rain).
(dial.) heavy and incessant rain.
any machine that uses energy to develop mechanical power; esp., a machine for transmitting motion to some other machine; an engine.
a software tool as the one used in searching and picking up certain information from a huge mass of data.
a liquid medicine injected into the body (as by a doctor).
an act or instance of injecting.
interval - a) a period of time between two points of time, events, etc.; intervening period; b) a short break during a play, cinema, etc.
a small stopper in a wooden sower preventing the seed from passing through.
a bunch of flowers; a bouquet.

the region in South Asia, south of the Himalayas, including a large peninsula between the Arabian Sea and Bay of Bengal, stretching into the Indian Ocean, that became independent in 1947 and a republic nation in 1950; India (more popularly known as Bhārata).
to call or cry aloud; to shout.
a piece or fragment.
a crowd; an assemblage; a herd.
a heap; a mass.
a split; a cleavage; a breach.
a ball to play with.
ಇಂಡೆಕೂಳು iṇḍekūḷu any food, esp. round-shaped, offered to one's dead ancestors. ಇಂಡೆಯನಾಡು iṇḍeyāḍu to play with a ball; ಇಂಡೆಯಾಡು iṇḍeyāḍu = ಇಂಡೆಯನಾಡು.
a woven chain of flowers; a garland.
